name: Dos Ojos Cenote Snorkel
description: Cenote Dos Ojos is part of one of the most famous underground river systems in the world.  Stretching over 50 miles, the full extent of the Dos Ojos system is yet to be discovered.  Dos Ojos (two eyes) is named after a pair of cenotes that connect into a giant underground cavern, an awesome effect that makes Dos Ojos one of the best known cenotes near Playa del Carmen for snorkeling and scuba diving.
